properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BAHAMAS.
99 FOOT M/V MEYFAS ADVENTURE, GREEN AND WHITE HULL,
FIVE PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT 
IN 21-20.236N 072-58.410W. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO RCC MIAMI, PHONE: 305 415 6800, E-MAIL: RCCMIAMI@USCG.MIL.
